description: This file defines a Data Access Object (DAO) interface for performing CRUD operations on 'Note' entities in a Room database, including methods to get all notes, get a note by ID, insert, update, and delete notes.

classes.name: NoteDao
classes.description: Data Access Object interface for Note entity, providing methods for CRUD operations.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes ordered by last updated time, returns LiveData of list of Notes.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a Note by its ID asynchronously; returns null if not found.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a Note into the database; on conflict, replaces existing note, returns the new row ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing Note in the database.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the given Note from the database.
